muxt generate
stdout 'routes has route for GET /'

-- index.gohtml --
{{define "GET /" }}
	<h1>Hello, world!</h1>
{{end}}

-- go.mod --
module server

go 1.22
-- template.go --
package server

import (
	"embed"
	"html/template"
)

var (
	//go:embed *.gohtml
	formHTML embed.FS

	templates = template.Must(template.ParseFS(formHTML, "*"))
)
